summary: An examination of the causes of the economic crisis of 2008.
cast: Andrew Luan|Robert Shiller|Louis Hyman|George Cooper|Robert H. Frank|Nell Minow|Joseph Stiglitz|Dan Ariely|Ed Andrews|Antoinette Coffi-Ahibo|Steve Nahas|Robert Wade|Jim O'Neill|Rose Alfano|Lawrence Citarello|Sarah Ludwig|Jim Finkel|Josh Zinner|Alex Chardiet|Steve Pennington
title: The Flaw
